zxiong.shapes

类 Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • zxiong.shapes.Shape
      • zxiong.shapes.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Shape

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Rectangle()
      Creates a default instance of a Rectangle object with all dimensions set to zero.
      Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle()
        Creates a default instance of a Rectangle object with all dimensions set to zero.
        Postcondition:
        Create a rectangle with all dimensions of zero

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height)
        Creates a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.
        参数:
        x - X-coordinate.
        y - Y-coordinate.
        width - width of the rectangle.
        height - height of the rectangle.
        Precondition:
        all dimensions must be positive.
        Postcondition:
        Side affect: Dimension set to imported values.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPerimeter

        public double getPerimeter()
        Calculates and returns the parimeter of the rectangle.
        指定者:
        getPerimeter 在类中 Shape
        返回:
        The preimeter of the rectangle.

      • getArea

        public double getArea()
        Calculates and returns the area of the rectangle.
        指定者:
        getArea 在类中 Shape
        返回:
        The area of rectangle.

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        Determines whether the point x,y is contained inside this rectangle.
        指定者:
        isPointInside 在类中 Shape
        参数:
        x - The X-coordinate of the point.
        y - The Y-coordinate of the point.
        返回:
        True if point is inside, false if point is outside.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
        Draws a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.
        覆盖:
        draw 在类中 Shape
        参数:
        marker - The surface PApplet draws on.

      • setDimension

        public void setDimension(double x,
                         double y,
                         double width,
                         double height)
        Set new dimension of a rectangle.
        参数:
        x - x-coordinate of the rectangle.
        y - y-coordinate of the rectangle.
        width - Width of the rectangle.
        height - Height of the rectangle.
        Postcondition:
        Side affect: the dimensions of the rectangle will be the input values.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset all dimension of a rect to zero.
        指定者:
        reset 在类中 Shape
        Postcondition:
        Side affect: All dimension reset to zero.

      • scale

        public void scale(double factor)
        Scale the rectangle by the input value.
        指定者:
        scale 在类中 Shape
        参数:
        factor - the factor value.
